message: Let's be fair and split the money while it's still worth a lot, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.
I appreciate your offer, but I think I can do better.  Let's try 60/40 in my favor this time.  We can both still come out ahead!
Bob, let's be realistic. The value is going down for you with each round. My last offer is still on the table: 55/45 my favor. Take it or leave it.
